items.name: Ext.plugin.Manager
create
items.text:
Creates a new Plugin from the specified config object using the config object's ptype to determine the class to
instantiate.

items.name: config
items.text: A configuration object for the Plugin you wish to create.

items.name: defaultType
items.text:
(optional) The constructor to provide the default Plugin type if the config object does not
contain a `ptype`. (Optional if the config contains a `ptype`).
